	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVOstake.sol#662)
		- lastUpdateTime = lastTimeRewardApplicable() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVOstake.sol#610)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVOstake.sol#662)
		- rewardPerTokenStored = rewardPerToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVOstake.sol#609)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVOstake.sol#662)
		- rewards[msg.sender] = 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVOstake.sol#668)
		- rewards[account] = earned(account) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVOstake.sol#612)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVOstake.sol#662)
		- userRewardPerTokenPaid[account] = rewardPerTokenStored (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVOstake.sol#613)
